AboutSection.title: WEB  DEVELOPER
AboutSection.about-profile: I am  a Highly motivated self taught web developer, currently seeking to lauch a career'. I have a passion for learning new technologies and I am always trying to learn new things. building web applications and services Familiar with development, optimization and deployement process for web-based technologies. I am always seeking to continue improving and try creating applications that would allow me to change the world through software. Motivated by innovative ideas and challenges  I like to share my solved problems and help people, scroll down a bit to find my published projects.
